Class Record

java.lang.Object
  Record

final class Record
extends Object

Utility class for Inventory. Fields are mutable and package-private. Does not override equals or hashCode.

Object Class Type:
Mutable Data Class

Field Summary
(package private)  int numOut
          The number of copies of the video that are currently checked out.
(package private)  int numOwned
          The number of copies of the video that are in the inventory.
(package private)  int numRentals
          The total number of times this video has ever been checked out.
(package private)  VideoObj video
          The video.

Field Detail

video

VideoObj video
The video.

Invariant:

numOwned

int numOwned
The number of copies of the video that are in the inventory.

Invariant:

numOut

int numOut
The number of copies of the video that are currently checked out.

Invariant:
numOut <= numOwned

numRentals

The total number of times this video has ever been checked out.

Invariant:
